lenders.name: evbart
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I believe in the power of creating something from nothing, though it may take small amounts of capital along the way.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping building out LivingSocial.com across the globe.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because:
A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love. 

Saint Basil  - Year of Birth: 330        Year of Death: 379 
Nationality: Greek
lenders.occupational_info:
Distance does not decide who is your brother and who is not. The church is going to have to become the conscience of the free market if it's to have any meaning in this world - and stop being its apologist. 
Bono 

www.bono.com

www.heifer.org

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Money is a gift from God and should be given to those in need.  When someone works hard and is in need of money to improve their situation it is an honor to help them.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: i should

lenders.name: DIE
lenders.loan_because: i want to have my one business. i would job four me in transport ( taxis and mini bus). i want to sollicit a monney to finance my business
lenders.occupational_info: my work

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: hard work and the desire to make a better life should always be rewarded.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a semi-retired nuclear scientist and a full time writer of Native American novels.

lenders.name: kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we will only have peace in the world when we truly become one people and help each other.

lenders.name: Lison
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to help people , when i heard about Kiva i just knew this was my chance .

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: Maybe I can help someone in a small way, and Kiva makes it easy to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I work inside an office job and it is a nice environment- I do paperwork and type a lot.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: although being a black woman in the u$a puts me at a clear disadvantage in this rat race, i am privileged enough to feel obligated to help bring my sisters around the world closer to self-sufficiency.
lenders.occupational_info: steady in the pursuit to walk in the light in a world that thrives in darkness.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is a wonderful way to assist someone who has little chance of receiving help otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people buy and sell property.

lenders.name: LISA
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part for making our world a more peaceful place for all of us to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a Mother trying to raise two responsible children.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: A "loan" feels different than a gift or grant.  A loan is issued, and accepted, because of confidence in the future...and that kind of confidence (hope) I sense from the applicants/borrowers is inspirational to me.
lenders.occupational_info: "God is good, all the time; all the time, God is good."

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: We are all brothers and sisters regardless of where we are born.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to help others whenever and wherever we can.  If we can "help a person to fish" in the process, then all the better.  And if we can do that without any other self-serving purpose, no matter how well-intended, then we are doing a truly good thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I started one of the first companies that provides telephone customer service entirely using agents that work from their homes.  Now, I help other companies develop the same capability.

lenders.name: Risa Beth
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have an obligation to make a positive difference.  Love really is the answer.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: If we work together all of our lives are enriched.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for putting color in plastic objects.  Red, blue, green, yellow - if you need a plastic part to have color, I can do that.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: There are times when we all could benefit from a helping hand... not just a hand out.  I am honored to be a part of such a wonderful program that brings much needed help to the people who need it most.  The best part of this program is the volunteerism involved.  One hundred percent of the money we loan through Kiva ends up in the hands of the recipients we've chosen.  Many thanks to all the volunteers who make this program possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide financial and business management in the high risk world of underwater construction.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We are in the position to help others and should do so.

lenders.name: Grif
lenders.loan_because: There are so many needy, capable people out there who can do so much with so little.
lenders.occupational_info: I am passionate about my work, but I try not to let it define me as a person.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe that we can all make a difference, even if in small ways.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: My investment can make a huge difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Woody & Yuni
lenders.loan_because: Islam says that all good muslims should help others, we prefer to help all regardless of relegion.
lenders.occupational_info: i sit in front of a computer and drive myself slowly crazy. My wife reminds me of the world outside my computer screen.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I think we can all do a little to help many.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: My family has been blessed by G-d most abundantly. We feel that it is a our responsiblitiy to share what we have with others!
lenders.occupational_info: Industrial Electrical Sales

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate the creation of sound in a movie.

lenders.name: NumbNut
lenders.loan_because: I want to help disadvantaged people, who through no fault of their own have not had the fortune to access the privileges which I enjoy on a daily basis. I love the thought that I am contributing in my own small way to someone living a life of dignity and hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Navigator/Surveyor on an oil & gas exploration vessel. As you can see from my photo I'm pretty F-UGLY! I've experienced first-hand the impact that poverty can have on people's lives. I've seen it, smelt it, and I want to help change it. I suppose I just want to make a difference. And, errrrr, beer is your friend... GET IT INTA YAAAA!!!!

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, and while I cannot give hours to make a difference, I can write a check and change a life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with large corporations in order to assist them in attracting and retaining top employees through career development and coaching.

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.occupation: Professor at University of St. Francis, Retired
lenders.loan_because: It is the best way to help others on a personal level.  I am pleased to be among "a global community of givers."
lenders.occupational_info: I have taught children and trained teachers for 49 years, and I never lacked optimism and hope for our children.  I have met the most wonderful people in the world.  I am blessed.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve a better life for themselves and their families. I hope they pass the good karma along.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop automotive seating for major OEM's.

lenders.name: shawn
lenders.loan_because: ..."when you give to the needy, do not let your left hand know what your right hand is doing, so that your giving may be in secret... "

lenders.name: ric
lenders.loan_because: the best way to help is to enable and empower those that want to improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: i help maintain the internet network you are using to read this message

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.occupational_info: I serve as a U.S. Recruiting Agent for for US institutions of higher education located around the world.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: We are a family with a vision for changing the world in the small ways we can.
lenders.occupational_info: We include school teachers, a pastor, a psychologist, a CPA and an engineer.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Project manager, printing, publishing industry. Freelance consultant.

lenders.name: TIENDREBEOGO
lenders.loan_because: je veux éléver des poules pondeuses.
lenders.occupational_info: j'envisage créer une petite ferme d'environ 150 poules pondeuses et grace au bénéfice que je tirrerai de cette ferme, je ferrai l'élévage de vaches laitieres de poules pondeuses d'embouche bovine, la culture de la tomate.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: How could I not?
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in graduate school to become a city planner.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that when you enable people to help themselves, they become a better person in their own eyes - proud, self-satisified, a worthy and contributing human being.  (Plus it makes me feel really GOOD)
lenders.occupational_info: My work in a school district is to try to come up with solutions to help children who are not achieving at an acceptable rate.  I help the teachers find ways to teach all children to read well -  so they can be successful in school as well as later in life.

lenders.name: In memory of my Gramma
lenders.loan_because: My gramma began lending as a project for us to do together. She taught me to believe a hand up is by far better than a hand out and it is so hard to make it without help.  We wanted to help because we can and we care about the world. I lost my gramma in Oct of 2008 but I continue reinvesting our money in her memory and honor, and I hope that we are able to make a difference in others' lives the same way she did in mine.
lenders.occupational_info: An 11th grade student

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: It's good to know that I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to provide young folks with information that I hope will help them realize their dreams.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to BE the change that I want to see in the world...we are all connected!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist who paints landscapes and nature. I like to think that I help people to take a few moments to stop and ponder the beauty of God's creation.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: As My Mother Taught Me...  Those Who Have More, Should Pay (and Do) More...
lenders.occupational_info: Software Engineer

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: a hand up is far more transformational than a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping good people doing good things....do more.  Just call me the connector, matchmaker and dealmaker.  I'll make it happen.

lenders.name: Missy
lenders.occupational_info: Real Estate Sales and Appraisal

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.occupation: Smoking and Alcohol Adviser for Young People
lenders.loan_because:
So many people here want to work really hard to make their businesses a success they deserve for people to believe in them and help them make it happen. 

KIVA is like charity only better because the money is returned ready to benefit someone else.
lenders.occupational_info:
I provide education and advice to young people about cigarettes and alcohol.
The photo is of me at Angkor Wat, Siem Reap, Cambodia in 1999

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: You can watch the money do something good for someone, and you can see what that individual is trying to accomplish.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run an agency of creative people who produce events for businesses.

lenders.name: Louis
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help individuals become entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of directly helping people and their families developing an income for living.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people who work hard have a good chance to succeed and improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired secretary.

lenders.name: kristina
lenders.loan_because: money is energy and it needs to flow.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people live better lives. I like that I know exactly how my funds are going  be used.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company raise capital and set up distribution.

lenders.name: Azadeh
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. I want others to enjoy the same quality of life as i have been so fortunate to experience.
lenders.occupational_info: I research socially responsible investment opportunities.

lenders.name: Mac & Leanne
lenders.loan_because: It is the most efficent method of changing someones life for the better.

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: I've been working as an international development consultant for the past several years and am fortunate to have first hand experience with the benefits of micro lending.  Micro finance institutions (MFIs) must scramble for funding, generally from donors, and the Kiva approach of brokering loans from private individuals brings a taste of business discipline to the process of helping people help themselves through loans that are expected to be repaid.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I feel that if one can help in anyway do it, its making this a better world for us to live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I repaired medical equipment in a hospital for over 35 years. Then I got into a really bad motorcycle wreck and almost lost my leg. I had to retire before my time. But I still try to help the best I can.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides an opportunity to assist people with fewer opportunities than I had - a small gesture toward creation of more equality.
lenders.occupational_info: As a (retired) university librarian, my philosophy was and remains that education is the first step and often primary means toward a better world.  Education is a luxury for some; improved finances may open doors to these folks' children.

lenders.name: Jim & Diana
lenders.loan_because: We believe this is a wonderful way to be charitable.
lenders.occupational_info: Diana has raised four idealistic children, one of whom guided us to Kiva, and Jim spent 40 years as a journalist and 7 as an educator. Both are enjoying retirement.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed.  What I have, I have received through the grace of God.  It is only just, that, in gratititude, I help others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Special Education Teacher of students who are profoundly mentally handicapped.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that I'm helping someone specific.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the customers of an online games website.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in passing on the blessings I've received, and that a propserous world is a peaceful world.

lenders.name: A.J.
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to have family that got me through a bad patch, I want to reach out to people working to create better lives for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working on writing a book

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.occupational_info: Help provide loans for housing for low income people

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women become independant.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of critically ill patients in an ICU. My family and I also care for many animals.

lenders.name: Frank & Mary
lenders.occupation: Both retired but work with wood in our shop now.

lenders.name: Mary and Tim
lenders.loan_because: we believe we are all One and that by helping others, we are Being the change we choose to see in the  world.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: We need to help people,that really need help.

lenders.name: Phoebe
lenders.loan_because: I want to see the world become a better place for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint pictures of the things and places I love.

lenders.name: haiyan
lenders.occupational_info: ortopedic specialist

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: The world is a better place when people help each other.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: Be the change you wish to see in the world
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people who are in pain.

lenders.name: Grunt / Roy
lenders.loan_because: I remember when I was a young boy after my Father died and someone I did not know pointed me in the right direction and started me on a course which lasted for 50 years.  This is just one way I am trying to repay that trust.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe that your Family, your God, your Work and your Education are the most important aspects of your life.  Persue all these equally well and success shall be yours.

lenders.name: Carol K
lenders.loan_because: Although I am far from wealthy, I am healthy and make a living. I need to pay it forward. We all need to pay it forward. ..
lenders.occupational_info: I am in sales and basically control my own income and destiny right now. Some day that may change but for now I will help any time I can.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed and I feel compelled to lend to those who could use a little help. Everyone deserves an opportunity to work towards a better life! Life is all about people voluntarily helping one another to make each other's lives better.

lenders.name: SuZ Xman
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people who work hard get the help (however little from me) that they need to succeed, in what are less than ideal circumstances for them to borrow the necessary funds traditionally, to grow and realize their dreams and help their families and their future.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to better myself and help my family - like the people who need a little help here.  I just hope I'm as relatively successful and even a fraction as ambitious as they seem to be.

lenders.name: Young
lenders.loan_because: one good deed deserves another
lenders.occupational_info: I work for The Walt Disney Company. (Mickey Mouse)

lenders.name: Nate Westheimer
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young businesses on their strategy. I also develop new business ideas myself.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: How can you not? $25 to help someone start a business to help them help themselves? This is called a "no brainer". It's not even a donation - it's a loan!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an internet company called Yahoo! We reach 500 million people world wide. I hope we can make an impact and help you grow your business.

lenders.name: Wylie
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to support women entrepreneurs in other countries trying to better their lives.

lenders.name: David and Jonnie
lenders.loan_because: As a former small business owners we appreciate people who don't want charity.
lenders.occupational_info: Former owners of Niemand Gymnastics School.

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to know one can help make a difference in this world and with many people working together we can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: One of my primary interests, now that I am retired, is supporting Jackie's Purrfect Match cat rescue organization with my skills as webmaster and photographer.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: It allows me to share God's blessings with others in a way that helps them become self-sufficient.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: People deserve a hand up - life should be this good for all.
lenders.occupational_info: Mailing for non-profits, profit companies - advertising, fund raising, etc.

lenders.name: JOHNBULL
lenders.loan_because: Because i want to make somebody else dream come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fulltime student and a fulltime worker hoping to make my dream come true.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.  Businesses create jobs.  Economic well-being supports peace, security, education, health, democracy, etc.

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to spend a few bucks!  Much more rewarding than the dress I was going to buy.

lenders.name: Lynda and Dan
lenders.occupation: Lynda: life coach; Dan: management consultant
lenders.loan_because: Together, we can all make a difference.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people help themselves and achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office and help customers and clients via the telephone who need properties restored after fires or floods.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I feel it's important to do everything we can to help other people.  From donating blood to helping someone with their dreams.

lenders.name: Chef Michael Madigan
lenders.loan_because: People need a break. Full stop!!!  Hey --if you can give a helping hand then you should. Things are tough out there so give if you can. These micro-loans save livess and build stronger families. Investing in females seems a better investment in my opinion.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work on yachts, travel the globe and prepare food that dazzles the palate and the eye. What more could you ask for.

Well it is time to lend some money and enough about me.

lenders.name: Ted Liegel
lenders.occupation: President of The American Disabled Equipment Fund
lenders.loan_because: I am wanting $6000 to be able to give my charity a non-profit tax exempt status. I ran into financial troubles when I got sick and ended up in the hospital. I wasn't able to make enough to pay back taxes for the business. In order to apply for the Tax Exempt Non-Profit status, I have to have these caught up.
lenders.occupational_info: My organization provides free medical equipment to the Disabled And Elderly of Northern Illinois. My goal is to be nation wide, and eventually world wide. I don't feel people should have to pay for something they need to perform everyday life duties.

lenders.name: M&M
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to share.

lenders.name: Adriel
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to have had a loan before and been able to pay it back.  It's such a blessing. And to help others who are in more need than I is a great privilege.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids how to play the piano. I meet with them once a week and teach them different songs and how to play music well.  It's not only a good job but it's also a lot of fun!

lenders.name: Brigid
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do. 
"Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has." ~M.M.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people. Kiva makes it easy to help by letting you lend what is a relatively small amount to me but can be a big help to someone in need who wants to make a successful living.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick., elderly, and handicapped people in their homes so they don't have to go into an institution

lenders.name: Sue Ellen
lenders.loan_because: this is the most direct way I can help the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make it easier for people to find information.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I am encouraged and uplifted by women in all parts of the world taking control of their financial futures
lenders.occupational_info: A small business owner

lenders.name: Ramirez
lenders.loan_because: This is my way to make a difference in someone's life. We are all part of a whole; a small amount to us makes a huge difference to someone else. I want to share the world with my children!
lenders.occupational_info: I work managing a technology implementation department. We install and fix computers and telephone systems.

lenders.name: Skip & Suzie
lenders.loan_because: A good way to actually help someone get out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: F-16 Fighter Engineer at Lockheed

lenders.name: Sen
lenders.loan_because: microloans stimulate entrepreneurship, whereas charity make people dependent.
lenders.occupational_info: I study how the brain stores memories.

lenders.name: Dori
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do to give others a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people sell cattle and advise on best cattle management practices.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I think that even by offering little, we can make a big difference in someone's life. I also loan because people in my life have been generous to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English (reading and writing) to teenagers in America.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: my community psychology class wanted to help others with microlending.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to finish up college and to become an animal trainer for exotic animals such as dolphins and whales.

lenders.name: Rashid Mayes
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe that we all share a responsibility to narrow the gap between the world that is and the world that should be. I hope that my participation in Kiva.org can ameliorate some of the economic realities faced by entrepreneurs in developing markets.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Software Engineer by trade, consulting and releasing software under the moniker Astrient Labs. Much of my consulting work involves building mobile applications for USA-based start-up companies. Through Astrient Labs, my sole-proprietorship (one person company), I develop and maintain CutieQs.com, HostJ2ME.com, and WorldDeveloper.og.

Recently my wife and I began the Astrient Foundation. The Astrient Foundation supports social innovation through scholarships, fellowships, and direct donations. Our first iteration is based in Accra, Ghana.

lenders.name: Diddi loves Haiti
lenders.loan_because: Diddi loves Haiti and the Haitian brothers and sisters and wants ot help. Be Blessed in JESUS name.
lenders.occupational_info: I do mission work to Haiti. So far 1 home has been built to help a poor family and 149 goats have been given threw the 1st fruite goat program. On feb 26th Julia's home was opened to help kids in need. Today we have 12 kids there and counting. Colborne Cow project was started and Aarons Chicks Chicken projest. You can see picture on my face book : Diddi worsoe washington. Blessigns to you this day in Jesus name. xoxoxo

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I can't save the world, but I can help...one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: After working 18 years in television, I am now a stay at home Grandmother!  My husband started his own business four years ago.  A Performing Arts School.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to live in the United States and have what I need and more. I want to be able to help others so they can have a better life.

lenders.name: judy
lenders.loan_because: I'm very interested in helping other women who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their families.  I admire them.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs to give back something.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm responsible for the computers and communications for a community of 400+ people. I love my job and my community.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to help,  to give back and to leave your own mark in the world. Also, I have been to Vietnam and I love the country and its wondeful people
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked with children with special needs first as a teacher and now as an administrator.

lenders.name: Mike & Amy
lenders.loan_because:
We want to pay it forward. We all need to pay it forward....
we want to be able to help a person or a family that is willing to work hard to help themselves....to make their lives better...It helps us realize our problems are small compared to others.
 We have learned so far in our lives that it is the little things you do for others that make the biggest impact on their lives, and ours.
Anyone can be an entrepreneur if they want to work for it. So many people here want to work really hard to make their businesses a success they deserve for people to believe in them and help them make it happen.
lenders.occupational_info: He is a Concrete Construction  Foreman & She is a Independent Beauty Consultant for Mary Kay Inc. and is blessed with being able to be home with the children

lenders.name: Lauren and Jenny
lenders.loan_because: we like the idea of helping people one-on-one and knowing the money is going to someone in need rather than someone on a Board of Directors at some big charity.
lenders.occupational_info: Lauren is a retired electronics technician who used to fix copiers and big commercial printers. I am an account manager in a commercial insurance agency.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.occupational_info: I am researching the history of a government agency.

lenders.name: TC in DC
lenders.loan_because: I believe that along with education, free-market capitalism is the greatest force on earth for eradicating poverty.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I'm impressed to see how hard  people work to make a better life.  I'm fortunate to be able to help in a small way.  It makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have been hurt, or families whose loved one has died, because of someone else's wrongdoing.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I'm interested in helping others ! I'm a strong believer in microcredits .
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an Refinery Operator in the Petrochemical Field for a major International Company,based in the United States.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Having achieved the "usual" definition of success in the U.S.A. left me feeling empty and dissatisfied.  My recent years, now living in Costa Rica, have taught me the value and inner satisfaction of small opportunities made to hardworking individuals here.  Kiva allows me greater outreach.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm helping my local community by bringing internet to rural schools, teaching about and building alternate energy projects, and assisting in sustainable rainforest and ranch management.

lenders.name: Tabrez
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone in need so they can better their life.

lenders.name: Cheney
lenders.loan_because: I think community-based development is a better alternative than top-down strategies; Kiva offers an opportunity to support locally based endeavors.
lenders.occupational_info: Hoping to work to promote human security, and specifically food security.

lenders.name: daniel
lenders.loan_because: my mother always told me to "light one little candle" and the world will be a brighter place

lenders.name: Julie

Robert F. Kennedy

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money loaned to people in poor countries goes a long way toward providing for their economic stability.
lenders.occupational_info: Retirement gives me time to provide assistance to those in need so that they and their families may one day experience an easier life.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: A small inconvenience to me may represent a major opportunity for someone else; and Lord knows, we need to improve the quality of life in poorer parts of the planet.

lenders.name: Olivia

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to use money than giving people the opportunity to improve their lives.

lenders.name: george

I have also seen how well money in the right hands can help change a life. Every person on this planet has the same basic needs and motivations and everyone has a dream that sometimes just needs a little boost to come true.

lenders.name: Ann

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I am an avid traveler.  I have seen a lot.   I just want to give back to some of the people in the countries I have visited - or am planning to visit.

lenders.name: Banks Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to make an impact in someone's life!

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I like Kiva because it's an organization that helps people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Vasiliki
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make the world a little bit better.
lenders.occupational_info: I write programs that help people design electronics.

lenders.name: Renee & Brian
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people that may not be as fortunate as I have been.

lenders.name: Daryl
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Honduras for 2 years and saw dire poverty first hand.  I want to do whatever I can to help permanently overcome that poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Loan risk analysis.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their lives.

lenders.name: KirstenQF
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky and I know it. I want to share my luck.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a health coach in person and online. My job is to help busy people get healthy and fall in love with themselves and their lives. I also do holistic skincare and bodywork therapies in a little office in downtown San Francisco. I am blessed to be surrounded by smiling, happy people every day, and when I come home I'm homeschooling an awesome kid with another on the way.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a office and do a lot of work on the computer.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: Thanks to Frontline, I became aware of micro-lending.  I used to believe that I had resources to make a difference in my corner of the world, one person at a time.  I am thrilled to have the chance to support other folk who are trying to change their stars.

lenders.name: carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I travel all over the world and I enjoy helping the less fortunate in some of those countries that I visit.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught  Physical Education to 12, 13, and 14 year old boys and girls.  the sports that I teach are soccer, football,badminton,basketball and many more fun games.

lenders.name: Pete & Angela
lenders.loan_because: we saw the news piece on ABC and felt touched by the story and we wanted to do what we could to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home Wife. My husband, Pete is an Engineer for an Aerospace Company.

lenders.name: Hernan The Civil
lenders.loan_because: I can...  a little.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Civil Engineer.

lenders.name: Mark and Rene
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us beyond measure.

lenders.name: george
lenders.occupational_info: I support large computer systems.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I love empowering those who need a hand up, not a hand out!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a photographer, a writer and a musician,

lenders.name: Heather & Mike
lenders.loan_because: Many problems in the world today stem from poverty.  Many people could improve their lives if only someone would give them the tools to do so.  By loaning we help provide those much needed monetary tools.  In a meaningful way we help our fellow man and in turn we are part of a wave which helps make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: One of us repairs computers and electronics and the other helps people manage their money.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: On this planet, to survive we must share. How we share may differ, but we must share for there to be a future.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: There are people in the world who have high hopes and large aspirations and the only thing holding them back from following their dreams is a lack of funds.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist producers and correspondents at a national television news network.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: These entrepreneurs need a little help right now...and who doesn't need help every now and then?

lenders.name: RJM
lenders.loan_because: I am not wealthy in U.S. terms, but compared to the rest of the world, I am quite well off.  I can afford to help.  And, hopefully make the world better!
lenders.occupational_info: I build a better present and future in my community by cultivating trees in the community forest.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to improve their lives and make things a little easier.  I admire women who are working while raising children and trying to continue their education, as I believe that education has the potential to impact not only the individual but eventually their neighbors, towns and countries.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am currently an artist working with clay.  I make handbuilt ceramic sculptures and other decorative items, with a particular interest in primitive pit-firing techniques and Raku.

I was very fortunate to become involved in the computer industry over 45 years ago.  I am now retired, but previously worked as a software engineer and then eventually a senior manager for a major computer software company.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky up to this point in my life

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed. After having the opportunity to work and visit some of these countries, I realized that all of us are one and that our goals in life, no matter what language or what color we are, are basically the same around the world. So why don't help each other to reach them.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy working as a teacher because I'm not only able to teach a curriculum but I'm able to plant a seed about social justice, and issues that will affect my students after I'm gone.

lenders.name: Dindin
lenders.loan_because: i wish to develop business

lenders.name: Jessica

lenders.name: Brian

lenders.occupational_info: improving the quality and security of cellular phones and the networks they rely on.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a family owned jewelry store.  It is the oldest business in our town (92 years).  We sell fine jewelry and gifts.

lenders.name: Karen

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Others haven't been as fortunate as I have.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: it's such minor amount to me, and offers so much potential to someone else.

lenders.name: classof09
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help people around the world out of poverty.

lenders.name: mohammad
lenders.loan_because: TO OPEN A NEW BUSINESS THAT  HELP ME IN FUTURE.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a student who study in univerity and i dont have an income so i am trying to get  a lend to open a small business to depend on myslf in future

lenders.name: JOHN
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I´m a right wing libertarian/objectivist, a believer in the benefits of a free market economy, entrepreneurship and honesty. It's nice to help people help themselves and others, without any government involvement or coercion. Just basic benevolence I guess.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It's an investment in humanity.  What could be better than that?

lenders.name: Jason and Janet
lenders.loan_because: We consider it an investment in the future of humanity.  Helping people help themselves leaves both parties feeling better about themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the unglamorous part of the Film industry.  I move things around.  My wife is a Registered Nurse and a teacher.  She heals people and educates them.

lenders.name: Allan
lenders.loan_because: I am impressed by those who work to be self sufficient under trying conditions or circumstances.

lenders.name: Mack
lenders.loan_because: it gives me the opportunity to make a difference in the world, however small it may be
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a managed care program in Texas that provides healthcare to people who financially cannot afford healthcare.  I visit with the doctors that participate with the plan and recruit new doctors to join

lenders.name: Tori
lenders.loan_because: I can! What a creative, wonderful, brilliant, yet SIMPLE way to reach across the world and help somebody out.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate interest-free microloans needed for health-related purposes.

lenders.name: Kay and Dennis
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate in our lives and believe in giving back, especially to those less fortunate who are trying to make a better life for their families.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that my small contribution can make such a large impact on someone's life. I have so much . . . I can share.
lenders.occupational_info: I do the accounting and IT work for a small grass seed business near my home.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because:
I am so blessed in my life and so full of gratitude!    I love the concept of re-cycling the loan once it's paid back  and re-loaning it.  Kiva makes the world community a smaller place where we are all connected.

I love Kiva because I feel personally connected to the women to whom I loan.  The women I loan to inspire ME!!

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: To demonstrate the love of Christ in a real and practical way.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students in foreign countries come to the US for education.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I truly hope I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired air traffic controller.

lenders.name: Michele and Kaya
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to work from home while raising my daughter. My husband and I value the comfortable life we have built together, and appreciate the opportunity to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle the financial operation of a small livestock ranch, as well as scheduling shipments (over water) of livestock to and from Hawaii.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. A bit here, a bit there and we can change the world

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: It is important to share and pass the blessings along.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Christian spiritual leader

lenders.name: EdZ
lenders.loan_because:
I can't stop... it's like goodwill/karma nicotine!

"Do good with what thou hast, or it will do thee no good."
-- William Penn, American colonial leader

"Sharing money is what gives it its value."
-- Elvis Presley

To date:  Loans to 68 different countries!

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I just like helping individuals and their families escape poverty.  I am going to do this for a few months here, and see if this is a model that could be applied in my neighborhood (I live in an extremely poor neighborhhod just outside Washington, DC that has a high number of immigrants).
lenders.occupational_info: Federal government contractor, national security work, various federal agencies

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to contribute to people that are willing to work hard and better their lives.

lenders.name: Nora & Meara
lenders.loan_because: Our Nana got us started with Kiva so we could learn about helping other people.
lenders.occupational_info: Our daddy is a merchant sailor and our mommy stays home to take care of us.

lenders.name: carrie
lenders.loan_because: "do unto others.... :)"

lenders.name: The Snarky
lenders.loan_because: I have been poor, and I want to help where and when I can.

lenders.name: Herbert
lenders.loan_because: A little amount can make a big difference.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Production Technician for concerts, and theater.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to personaly help others to help themselves in developing counties.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair refrigeration equipment like walk in coolers or freezers for storing food.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: It's a very cool concept. It works!
lenders.occupational_info: I make movies.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to pursue a dream, make a living, feed their family, and live life with hope of a better tomorrow.

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I ask people questions about themselves so that they can find their own answers.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I saw the Kiva program profiled on ABC news and thought what a unique program to help others in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: Brookview Press is a small, independently owned publisher located in Castleton-on-Hudson, about 2 hours north of New York City. We publish unique, designer-quality, trade paperback books in the literary nonfiction genre about nature and the environment, with a strong spirituality component.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: Because I like fish, seals and well fed people.

lenders.name: Ainsley
lenders.loan_because: I have a small business and remember how hard it was to get it started.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: To assist new businesses
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired newspaperman who writes poetry.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: We are a small business and are glad people invested in our company. So this is our way on passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a manufacture of medical products for heart patients. We make a surgical bra and harness for people who have heart surgery.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate and would like to share some of my good fortune with people in other countries.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is my responsibility to lend a helping hand.  The micro loans may be loaned to projects and people of my choice.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a research chemist and was raised on a family farm in Florida.  My parents struggled to survive on a small farm that raised vegetables and cattle, pigs, and poultry.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: It is a great idea to support others directly. Lending with Kiva is easy, fun, and important at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software systems that manage telephone networks.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: It allows me to help people from all over the world improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people who need surgery and make sure that they are asleep and comfortable during the operation.

lenders.name: Bob & Jean
lenders.loan_because: We love all our neighbors in the world community---and we look forward to a world where everyone has freedom from want, freedom from fear, freedom of speech, and freedom to worship.   "If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him?   Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth". (1 John 3: 17-18)
lenders.occupational_info: Before we retired, Jean taught medical-surgical nursing and Bob taught secondary school Honors and Advanced Placement Physics.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: Microloans are much more than just throwing money at a problem, they affect people directly. It's a very profound experience to actually see your loan help deserving and enterprising people in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies figure out how to market their products.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I am able
lenders.occupational_info: microelectronics

lenders.name: Shari
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me and it is my purpose to help someone else.  Imagine a world if we each helped one another.  Hunger--what's that?!
lenders.occupational_info: I represent people charged with crimes that cannot afford to hire an attorney.  They do not have to pay me anything to represent them.  It is FREE to each client.  It is what I am meant to do.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: A little can do so much for so many people.

lenders.name: Mia & Mason
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to achieve their dream.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I have been the benificiary of enormous amounts of support

lenders.name: Debora
lenders.loan_because: I love riding my bicycle and know how costly repairs can be.  I'm grateful I can help so one else repair needed transportation.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do!  If I can give someone a little bit of money so they can make their lives dream come true, I'm definitely all about that!
lenders.occupational_info: Well, currently I'm working for a property tax consultant company.

lenders.name: Hank
lenders.loan_because: I believe micro loans are a great solution for lifting the poor out of poverty and raising the image of the richer nations among them.

lenders.name: Thomas Leurent
lenders.loan_because: it helps

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to show my support for people who are pursuing a better life.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Yesterday, I saw Kiva's story on PBS channel 12 in Denver. I was inspired by the grass roots approach of the organization and felt like it was a good fit for me.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I find this a much more personal form of helping eradicate poverty than contributions to charitable organizations because you know the individuals you are helping and their stories. It's a joy to see people become self-sustaining and able to help their families achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to help women and children become all they can be.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I help homeless people in my city to learn how to live independantly and get back on their feet.  I also go to school and hope to begin teaching soon.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I have a small business myself as do others in my family.  We would like to see people with this same desire experience success.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce videos, many concerning the subject of social justice

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because: Loaning to others is loaning to all of us.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Seems like a good idea.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed to live in this country of abundance and I believe it is our moral obligation  to give a "helping hand" to those less fortunate and those who have an opportunity through hard work and a goal to make their lives better and more meaningful.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker who works in a large hospital in California. I work with children who have congenital heart problems. It is very rewarding to see the little children get well with the proper medical treatment and support from the staff and their families.

lenders.name: Nick and Jen
lenders.loan_because: Stimulating entrepreneurship is the best way to reduce global poverty.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.occupation: IT Professional and part time artist
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.occupational_info: I write about the philosophy, literature and history of the ancient Greeks and Romans; I teaching university students.

lenders.name: Jarrod
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has a right to build a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell vibratory conveyors that are used in various process industries (mining, foundry, recycling, pharmaceutical, foods, wood and paper).

lenders.name: Thom
lenders.loan_because: because I can and so many need

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I can do something small that will be huge for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure people are paid on time.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because:
I love to help people help themselves!
 I have been in need myself .
lenders.occupational_info: I own a musical instrument store

lenders.name: Lou
lenders.loan_because: We are all the same.

lenders.name: Rhett Wertzbaugher
lenders.loan_because: I hope that I can help someone better their life.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: My cup overflows.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: we all must help each other attain personal goals for the betterment of  the individual and subsequently, humanity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help bring medications, which can one day positively impact the lives of patients with cancer, to market.
